attributes.action: remove for entertainment purposes only from psychic and mediumship services
attributes.additional_details: Psychic and Mediumship and spirit communication are part of some peoples beliefs. But in practising and offering there services in line with personal beliefs those psychics and mediums must say that their work is "for entertainment purposes" so should vicars, priests etc have placades outside church for entertainment purposes only too. As the restrictions for psychic, mediums and paranormal is that it can't be proven scientifically. Well neither can God or Jesus or any religion or religious practice. Stop the biased laws against spiritualism.
